channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump tried to fire Corporation for Public Broadcasting board members. Then came DOGE
item.description: DOGE staffers tried to assign a team to the independent Corporation for Public Broadcasting after President Trump's purported firing of three board me...

item.title: Museum opens in Czech Republic at site where Oskar Schindler saved 1,200 Jews
item.description: The former textile factory in the town of Brněnec was stolen by the Nazis from its Jewish owners in 1938 and turned into a concentration camp. This we...

item.title: A trove of forgotten Nazi documents is found in Argentina's Supreme Court basement
item.description: Inside boxes found in the basement were documents "intended to consolidate and propagate Adolf Hitler's ideology in Argentina," the court said. Suprem...

item.title: Michael Jordan joins NBC as the network revives its NBA coverage
item.description: It has been over 20 years since NBC had rights to broadcast NBA games. Its last run was during the 90s, which coincided with Michael Jordan's reign ov...

item.title: 5/12: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: How Trump plans to lower drug costs; Reporter's Notebook: How Medicaid cuts hit rural patients first

item.title: Bowen: Denying food to Gaza is 'weapon of war', says UN refugee agency head
item.description: The BBC's international editor Jeremy Bowen speaks to the head of the UN agency that supports Palestinian refugees.

item.title: Marcos' hold on senate grows shaky while Duterte wins mayor race from jail
item.description: The Philippines' mid-term elections saw fewer than expected senators elected from President Marcos' camp.

item.title: Gov. Gavin Newsom pushes California cities to implement bans against homeless encampments
item.description: The state is releasing a model ordinance that cities can use as a basis for their own local anti-encampment ordinances.

item.title: Trump defends plan to use Qatari luxury jet for Air Force One
item.description: Trump says he'd be "stupid" to not accept the aircraft "free of charge", after Qatar denied it amounted to a gift.

item.title: Campus protests flare on a smaller scale than last spring, but with higher stakes

item.title: Trump's mediation offer on Kashmir puts India in a tight spot
item.description: For decades, third-party mediation on Kashmir has been taboo in the Indian foreign ministry.

item.title: Russia responsible for downing of MH17, UN body rules
item.description: All 298 people on board the Malaysia Airlines flight died after it was shot down by a Russian-made missile.

item.title: Officials drop traffic charges that led ICE to arrest 19-year-old Georgia teen

item.title: Texas Lottery faces scrutiny amid jackpot controversies and leadership shakeup
item.description: The lottery recently banned online couriers, but some state legislators are considering more regulation.

item.title: Trump’s plan to accept free Air Force One replacement from Qatar raises ethical and security worries
